summary: This is an email exchange between Geoffrey Berman and an unnamed recipient regarding a potential lead in the Epstein case. Berman forwards a tip about a NY-based Canadian who may have relevant information, providing a contact number for follow-up.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: He is the sender of the email forwarding a tip about a potential informant with information relevant to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Likely a shortened reference to Geoffrey Berman, the sender of the email.

events.title: Email Tip Forwarded Regarding Epstein Informant
events.description: Geoffrey Berman forwards an email tip about a NY-based Canadian who supposedly has information relevant to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: A tip was forwarded to SDNY (Southern District of New York) about a potential informant with information on Epstein.
The informant is described as a 'NY-based Canadian' and was connected via a NJ doctor and businessman.
The source characterizes the informant as 'a somewhat sketchy guy' but suggests the lead is worth following up on.
The communication occurred on August 8, 2019, shortly after Epstein's arrest.
